cancelEscrowArrangement(uint256).details: This cancels any escrow arrangement and returns the funds to the users

params._escrowId: Escrow ID is the unique id of an escrow arrangement from which we can fetch details about an escrow

completeEscrowArrangement(uint256).details: Completes the escrow by exchanging the tokens between two parties

params._escrowId: Takes in escrow ID as an input

createEscrowArrangement(address,address,.details: This function create an escrow arrangement as the user requests

params.amountIn: Amount the initiator is willing to give
params.amountOut: Amount the initiator is expecting at current market rate with slippage included
params.duration: Duration for which the escrow should be valid and cannot be accessed after it
params.participant: Address of the escrow participant whom the sender is expecting funds from in exchange of their funds
params.tokenInAddress: Token address of the escrow initiator token
params.tokenOutAddress: Token address of the escrow participant token
